channel.title: How to connect to other servers
channel.description:
Right, so Ive got moparscape, and I can do "start new server" and play on hybrid scape, but I dont know how to connect to other peoples! :mad: I went on http://www.moparisthebest.com/serverstatus.php
3eta scape pkscapepk.no-ip.org 43594 100% 12-15-06 Server Online!
so I went onto file > new server > pkscapepk.no-ip.org then onto file > new port > 43594 and it tells me that the server must of offline. Ive tried it with a few different ones but I dont know what to do! Plz help :( :confused:

item.title: How to connect to other servers

item.description:
@hmongboi wrote:

hey do we need hamachi to paly with others?

Read full topic

item.title: How to connect to other servers
item.dc:creator: @Mrquarter Mrquarter
item.description:
@Mrquarter wrote:

Ok here you go.

  1. Go to www.moparisthebest.com
  2. Wait for it to load.
  3. Put in a Username/pass that you can remember
  4. Put in the server ip (ex: sunscape1.no-ip.org) in that format
  5. Click login.
  6. Enjoy.

-Mrquarter

Read full topic
item.source: How to connect to other servers
